Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at 104th/Torrence
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 95th, Colfax, Torrence & 104th due to a street blockage nr 104th/Torrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 95th, Colfax, Torrence and 104th due to a street blockage near 104th/Torrence.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Austin
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Austin due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Austin due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
